name: brexit-day-time-register
title: Brexit day/time register
description: This dataset holds a collaborative register of the day/time when Brexit is due to happen

resources.name: Brexitdatetimeregister
resources.description:
This file contains a collaboratively maintained register of the date/time when Brexit is due to happen. The file is on github so it can be collaboratively maintained.

Please use ISO8601 for any new entries. ISO8601 is a good multinational standard.
